version_description:
The Legendary Witch Queen is here!
- As a ranged supporter, her Ultimate polymorphs foes into frogs!

'Rapunzel's Broken Tower - Sunset' Duel arena added!
- Which strategy and Legend will you use in this larger arena?!
- Appears in the 4th Arena Slot rotation!

Abilities added!
- Get a free Ability Box when you reach Level 5 with a Legend!
- 3 Abilities added for each Legend
- Ability Growth added!
- You can now obtain Abilities from Boxes

SMASH Event Pop-up Store is now open!
- Perform missions throughout March 30-April 8 to earn SMASH Coins!
- Exchange them for Puzzle Pieces, Key Doublers and other incredible rewards

SMASH LEGENDS Grand Opening!

New character added
- The first specialist, Ducky & Swan is joining SMASH LEGENDS!
- She transforms into a powerful Swan Knight upon gaining 3 stacks on her Ultimate.

Crown Guard map added
- The Queenâ€™s Chessboard (Noon) has been expanded into a (Sunset) version!
- This map appears on the 3rd Arena slot rotations.

Ability Added
- The number of abilities for each Legend increased to 4!

New Events
- SMASH Pass is now available.
- Grand Opening Attendance Event, Playtime Event will be held.
- Look forward to the Spring Greetings event on April 27th!
